data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Pamplemousses.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Pamplemousses, Mauritius
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the state of Pamplemousses.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 133,900 people living in Pamplemousses through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Pamplemousses, Mauritius to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.

Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Pamplemousses with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the state of Pamplemousses. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Pamplemousses.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Pamplemousses, Mauritius has a population of 133,900.

We estimate Pamplemousses has 13,017 people who might know Jesus, 30,449 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 90,433 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 10 neighbors who need Jesus.
